numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.wmg.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed atmospheric concentrations of pre-industrial well mixed gases: excluding CO2

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.CO2.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed atmospheric concentrations of pre-industrial well mixed gas: Carbon Dioxide

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.sls.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed atmospheric concentration of pre-industrial short lived (reactive) gas species

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.nat_aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed concentrations of pre-industrial natural aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.nat_aer_precur.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed concentrations of pre-industrial natural aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.sl_aer.conc
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed concentrations of pre-industrial short lived (reactive) aerosol species

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.nat_aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed emissions of pre-industrial natural aerosols

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.nat_aer_precur.em
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed emissions of pre-industrial natural aerosol precursors

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.sl_aer.em
numericalRequirement.description: Prescribed emissions of pre-industrial short lived (reactive) aerosol species

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.bc.other>
numericalRequirement.description: Impose changing conditions of, for example, land use changes only, or anthro aerosols only, or volcanic aerosols only etc

numericalRequirement.name: 7.3E.ensemble
numericalRequirement.description: Create multi-member ensembles initialised from different points in the control run
